title: Total War: WARHAMMER 2 - Developer Interview: Free For All - Campaign & More
description:
Total War: WARHAMMER 2 - Developer Interview: Free For All - Campaign & More - Hey guys!  I am excited to show you this awesome Total War: Warhammer 2 Developer Interview.  This is a group interview and I am joined with Indypride from Milk and Cookies and Oakley from Invicta.  We cover a wide variety of questions about multiplayer, Campaign and More.  Enjoy :D

Invicta: https://www.youtube.com/user/THFEProductions

Milk&Cookies: https://www.youtube.com/user/milkandcookiesTW

Interview Questions:
2:13 - Start of Interview
2:50 - Main improvement from Warhammer 1
8:01 - Magic in Warhammer 2
11:28 - Expanding the Modding Tools
13:20 - Lords & Heros
16:05 - Multiplayer & FFA
18:25 - Siege Battles
21:04 - Rogue Armies & Ruin Cities
25:38 - Dragons
26:41 - Transportation between the 2 worlds
27:58 - Rampage & other Special Abilities
29:08 - Creating New Units
31:26 - What Warhammer Monster is your spirt Animal
32:51 - DLC
35:05 - Historical Campaign Storylines
36:48 - Geometric Web

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
